Uses of Class
jgame.controller.TweenController

  • Packages that use TweenController 
    Package Description
    jgame.controller
    The jgame.controller package contains the JGame controller framework.

    • Uses of TweenController in jgame.controller

      Subclasses of TweenController in jgame.controller 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AlphaTween
      A tween that allows for modifying the alpha of an object.
      class  MovementTween
      A tween that allows for movement in two dimensions.
      class  RotationTween
      A tween that allows for rotation of an object.
      class  ScaleTween
      A tween that allows for scaling of an object.
      class  SizeTween
      A tween that allows for size in two dimensions.
      Fields in jgame.controller declared as TweenController 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private TweenController TweenController.next
      The controller that will be attached after this one.
      Fields in jgame.controller with type parameters of type TweenController 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<TweenController> TweenController.with
      The list of tween controllers that will be run with (beginning at the same time as) this one.
      Methods in jgame.controller that return TweenController 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TweenController TweenController.getNext()
      Gets the next link in the chain, or null if no chain is set.
      Methods in jgame.controller with parameters of type TweenController 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TweenController.chain(TweenController... chain)
      Calls chain(TweenController) on all given items.
      void TweenController.chain(TweenController end)
      Adds the given controller to the end of the chain.
      void TweenController.setNext(TweenController next)
      Sets the next link in the chain.
      void TweenController.with(TweenController... tweens)
      Calls with(TweenController) on all the given items.
      void TweenController.with(TweenController tween)
      Sets the given tween to start with this tween.
      Method parameters in jgame.controller with type arguments of type TweenController 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TweenController.chain(java.util.List<TweenController> chain)
      Calls chain(TweenController) on all items in the given list.
      void TweenController.with(java.util.List<TweenController> tweens)
      Calls with(TweenController) on all given items.
